meanings.definition: The quality of being stylish and neat in appearance.
meanings.sent1: His dappernesses caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: She always exudes dappernesses with her impeccable sense of style.
meanings.sent3: His dappernesses was so striking that even the fashion critics were impressed.
meanings.sent4: Her dappernesses shone like a beacon of elegance in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The dappernesses of his outfit was unforgettable, leaving a lasting impression on everyone.

meanings.definition: The state of being well-groomed and fashionable.
meanings.sent1: The actor's dappernesses on the red carpet was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: She maintained her dappernesses even during busy workdays.
meanings.sent3: His dappernesses was so on point that he could easily grace the cover of a magazine.
meanings.sent4: Her dappernesses was like a breath of fresh air in the mundane office environment.
meanings.sent5: The dappernesses of his attire was the talk of the town, setting a new trend in fashion.
